name: A Dicey Shootout
description:
A Dicey Shootout Is a Wave survival Shooter developed for the GMTK game jam,

Shoot down mobs with a randomized gun, move by pressing space, but be careful! you'll roll a new gun with every movement!

- don't get too greedy, if you keep the same gun for over ten seconds your cowboy spirt will get restless and roll again, moving you into the line of fire!

- how long can you survive? probably longer than me D:

-pressing esc during the game will shut if off.

(p.s. this is my first published game don't go to hard on me lol)
